section.p: This section lists and describes any healthcare encounters pertinent to the patient's current health status or historical health history. An encounter is an interaction, regardless of the setting, between a patient and a practitioner who is vested with primary responsibility for diagnosing, evaluating, or treating the patient's condition. It may include visits, appointments, or non-face-to-face interactions. It is also a contact between a patient and a practitioner who has primary responsibility (exercising independent judgment) for assessing and treating the patient at a given contact. This section may contain all encounters for the time period being summarized, but should include notable encounters.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1198-7940, CONF:1198-10386, CONF:1198-32547 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.22"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2015-08-01"
SHALL conform to Encounters Section Entries Optional template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.22)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1198-15461)/@code="46240-8" Encounters (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1198-15462, CONF:1198-31136)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHOULD contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:1198-7951, CONF:1198-15465)
Conforms to Encounter Activity2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.49:2015-08-01)
SHALL conform to Encounters Section Entries Optional template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.22)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1198-15461)/@code="46240-8" Encounters (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1198-15462, CONF:1198-31136)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:7942, R2.1=CONF:1198-7942)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:7943, R2.1=CONF:1198-7943)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHOULD contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:1198-7951, CONF:1198-15465)
Conforms to Encounter Activity2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.49:2015-08-01)

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:10386 ) such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.22"
Consol Encounters Section Entries Optional SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:15461)/@code="46240-8" Encounters (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:15462)

Consol Encounters Section Entries Optional SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:7943, R2.1=CONF:1198-7943)

Consol Encounters Section Entries Optional If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHOULD contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:7951, CONF:8802) Conforms to Encounter Activities (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.49)
